1: Praise the Lord.[a] Praise, you servants of the Lord, praise the name of the Lord.
2: Let the name of the Lord be blessed, from now to eternity.
3: From the rising of the sun to its setting, the name of the Lord is to be praised.
4: High above all the nations is the Lord. His glory towers above the heavens.
5: Who is like the Lord our God? He is seated on high.
6: He bends down to look at the heavens and at the earth.
7: He raises the poor from the dust. He lifts the needy from the garbage pile
8: to seat them with nobles, with the nobles of his people.
9: He is the one who settles the barren woman in her home as a joyful mother of children. Praise the Lord.
